20101202220035.286|20101202220036.714|CCO|LEADING OFF TONIGHT, CENSURE.
20101202220036.714|20101202220038.143|CCO|CHARLIE RANGEL HAS BEEN A 
20101202220038.143|20101202220039.571|CCO|POWERFUL AND SPIRITED VOICE IN 
20101202220039.571|20101202220041.000|CCO|THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES AND

20101202220043.500|20101202220046.000|CCO|OF THE HOUSE WAYS AND MEANS 
20101202220046.000|20101202220048.500|CCO|COMMITTEE, BUT TODAY, HE COULD 
20101202220048.500|20101202220051.000|CCO|BE FORCED TO STAND IN THE WELL 
20101202220051.000|20101202220053.000|CCO|OF THE HOUSE AND FACE CENSURE BY
20101202220053.000|20101202220055.000|CCO|HIS PEERS.
20101202220055.000|20101202220057.000|CCO|WHEN THAT HAPPENS, WE'LL BRING 
20101202220057.000|20101202220059.000|CCO|YOU THE DRAMATIC SCENE.

20101202220801.000|20101202220803.000|CCO|JOHN FEEHERY, THE SPOKESMAN FOR 
20101202220803.000|20101202220805.000|CCO|DENNIS HASTERT.
20101202220805.000|20101202220807.000|CCO|FORCES REPUBLICANS TO VOTE IF

20101202225848.143|20101202225849.571|CCO|NOW, THIS IS A CHARGE THAT'LL
